text: Watchtower. Seems to just be a hint to head to the temples in the sky.
Barren Temple. You can find a potion of mimicium here to start your quest. Later you will need to revisit to help this temple flourish.
Ominous Temple. A large pool of ominous liquid is needed here. Sea of Mimicium will be helpful.
Henkev√§ Temple. "Spirited Temple". Potions here require mimicium. Pheromone will aid you. They might also need a little kick.
Kivi Temple. A boss fight here might be easier with a spell unlocked in another temple
